properties.name: captureResultSetNavigate
properties.label: ResultSet navigation
properties.description: Capture timings for executions of ResultSet.one()/all() to read the next row in a result set. This defaults to true since the timing for this timer is a good indication of query fetch size issues and cassandra latency, but it can be disabled if it is common to return millions of rows and the overhead of System.nanoTime() becomes relevant.

properties.name: stackTraceThresholdMillis
properties.label: Stack trace threshold (millis)
properties.description: Any query that exceeds this threshold will have a stack trace captured and attached to it. An empty value will not collect any stack traces, a zero value will collect a stack trace for every query.
